column1: #Text=Iroh says : " Where are you taking me ? "
#Text=Earthbender captain says : " We 're taking you to face justice . "
#Text=Earthbender captain says : " A place you 're quite familiar with , actually .
#Text=" Earthbender captain says : " It was greater than you were , apparently .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I acknowledge my defeat at Ba Sing Se .
#Text=After 600 days away from home , my men were tired , and I was tired .
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " I 'm sure they 'll be back .
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " You should get some rest .
#Text=" Katara says : " Everything 's going to be okay ... " Kay - fon says : " Your brother is in good hands .
#Text=I would be shocked if the Avatar returned without him .
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " The sun is rising .
